Class ArtManager

java.lang.Object
usecases.art.ArtManager
public class ArtManager
extends java.lang.Object
SINGLETON class Keeps track of every piece of art

  • Method Details

    • artExists

      public boolean artExists​(Art art)
      Returns true if an art piece exists in the library, false otherwise
      Parameters:
      art - piece to check
      Returns:
      true if art exists here

    • getArt

      public Art getArt​(java.util.UUID id)
      Returns an art piece if it exists in the library, null otherwise
      Parameters:
      id - the UUID of the target art
      Returns:
      an Art object or Null

    • createNewArt

      public void createNewArt​(java.lang.String artName, java.lang.String art, float artPrice, java.util.UUID walletID)
      Returns true of the art was successfully added to the library, false otherwise Adds an art piece to the library if it does not already exist in the library
      Parameters:
      art - -> the new art piece to add to the library
      artName - the String name of the new art
      artPrice - the float price of the new art
      walletID - the UUID of the wallet that will contain this art

    • getArtByWallet

      public java.util.Map<java.util.UUID,​ArtFacade> getArtByWallet​(java.util.UUID walletId)
      Returns the art pieces found in a specific wallet
      Parameters:
      walletId - the UUID of the target wallet
      Returns:
      a mapping of the format that contains all the art in this wallet

    • getAllArt

      public java.util.Collection<Art> getAllArt()
      Get all the art
      Returns:
      a Collection of Art

    • addArt

      public void addArt​(Art art, java.util.UUID walletID)
      Adds a piece of art to the system
      Parameters:
      art - an Art object to be added
      walletID - the UUID of the wallet the art is contained in
